name: .X3G
summary: Learn about .X3G files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To print the 3D model an X3G file describes, open your MakerBot, FlashForge, or Wanhao 3D printer's printing software and follow the software's typical "print from file" workflow. For example, in MakerBot Desktop, you can print an X3G file by selecting File â†’ Print from File from the program's menu bar and then selecting your X3G file.
